member.name: M:InternshipClass.WebAPI.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get
member.summary: Getting Weather Forecast for five days for default location.

member.name: M:InternshipClass.WebAPI.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Getting Weather Forecast for today + 7 days ahead for specific location.
member.param: It should be between -90 and 90. For example: latitude for Brasov is 45.75
It should be between -180 and 180. For example: longitude for Brasov is 25.3333
